caption: Cloud API
description: Cloud API events describe the Cloud Control & Data Plane Activity. e.g. (AWS Cloudtrail, GCP Cloud Audit Logs)
name: cloud_api

1.caption: Login
1.description: The event pertains to login activity.

2.caption: IAM
2.description: The event pertains to Identity and Access Management (IAM) activity (e.g. policy updates, user creations, etc.).

3.caption: Operational
3.description: The event pertains to cloud resource operations activity (e.g. data downloads, launched virtual machines, etc.).
